title: Update UI theme to match Turtle Wax website colors and text styling

requirements.text: Update the site-wide visual theme to closely match the Turtle Wax website look-and-feel, specifically aligning the primary/secondary color palette and default text colors used across the UI (headers, body text, links, buttons, cards, borders, and section backgrounds).

quotes: Make exact as turtlewax website theme with same colour text

acceptanceCriteria: The global Tailwind/CSS variable tokens (e.g., background/foreground/primary/secondary/accent/muted/border/ring) are updated so the site’s dominant colors and text colors visually match the Turtle Wax-inspired theme.
Text colors across all major sections (Header, Home hero, Brand sections, Brands section, About section, Footer) are consistent with the new theme and maintain readable contrast.
No blue/purple becomes the primary brand color (keep within the Turtle Wax-inspired palette while meeting accessibility/contrast).

requirements.text: Apply the Turtle Wax-inspired theme consistently to key components by adjusting their Tailwind classes to use the updated theme tokens (e.g., ensuring headings, navigation links, section dividers, badges, and hover states reflect the new palette rather than the prior charcoal–orange styling).

quotes: Make exact as turtlewax website theme with same colour text

acceptanceCriteria: SiteHeader navigation text, hover states, and header background/border styling align with the new theme tokens and do not look like the previous theme.
HomeHero gradient/background, headline accent color, and decorative blobs are updated to match the new theme palette.
BrandSection divider color and ProductCard hover/active styling (including title hover color) match the new theme.
BrandsSection icon accent backgrounds/colors and card styling match the new theme.
SiteFooter link color and icon styling match the new theme.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources are read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose around them instead).
Keep the existing site branding name/slug behavior driven by frontend/src/config/branding.ts and environment variables (do not rename the app unless explicitly requested).
nonGoals: Do not copy Turtle Wax website content, layout structure, proprietary assets, or trademarks/logos; only adapt a similar color/typography theme.
Do not change backend behavior, product catalog data, or add new backend endpoints.
Do not add new pages or new product features beyond theme/styling changes.
